result.execSummary:
The defendant Alfonso L Williams was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Criminal Trespass to Dwelling, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.14.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court orders any costs and surcharges that can be waived to be waived.  Court ordered any mandatory costs and surcharges to be paid at the rate of $20.00 per month commencing 12-01-2015
With credit for 80 days served FOR A TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Alfonso L Williams

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Alfonso L Williams in court with attorney Mark Allan Dluzak.  Defendant Alfonso L Williams in custody.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  

Defendant changes his plea to GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty.   Defendant advised that if not a United States Citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found that defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea.  Court found defendant guilty and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.  

Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  Court sentenced defendant to serve 80 DAYS in the House of Correction with credit for 80 days served FOR A TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

Court orders any costs and surcharges that can be waived to be waived.  Court ordered any mandatory costs and surcharges to be paid at the rate of $20.00 per month commencing 12-01-2015.  Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief received and filed.

Attorney Mark Allan Dluzak in court, defendant Alfonso L Williams not in court, in custody.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 24.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 2, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Mark Allan Dluzak in court, defendant Alfonso L Williams not in court, in custody.  Sara Nicole Volden Schroeder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 24.  Stipulated request for adjournment received and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY to be monitored by portable breathalyzers.  No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Gloriona T

Defendant Alfonso L Williams in court with attorney Enku Edgar Lin.  Defendant Alfonso L Williams in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 4, 2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Alfonso L Williams
Current: 1722 N 12th Street, #12, Milwaukee, WI 53206   (Effective: 07-17-2015)
Prior: 1545 North 7th Street Apt 7H, Milwaukee, WI 53205
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
